feed.title: HEART
feed.subtitle: Heart Equity and Access - Responsible Tranplantation.

entry.title: Joint Retreat
entry.summary: Our team members Dr. Paul Potnuru and Dr. Yafen Liang attended a Joint Retreat on 2/3/2024. The Joint Retreat was held at UTHealth Houston, involving two departments: the McGovern Medical School’s Department of Anesthesiology, Critical Care, and Pain Medicine, and the McWilliams School of Biomedical Informatics (MSBMI).

entry.title: Dr. Brown Attended the National Academies Event

link.title: Dr. Brown Attended the National Academies Event

entry.summary:
Our team member Dr. Cheryl Brown attended the National Academies event, The Use of Race and Ethnicity in Biomedical Research - Meeting 3, a meeting focus on race and disparities from different disciplines.
The event details and recording can be found here.

entry.title: Dr. Zou Presented at a UTHealth AIM-AHEAD Conference

link.title: Dr. Zou Presented at a UTHealth AIM-AHEAD Conference

entry.summary: Our team member Dr. Na Zou presented at a UTHealth AIM-AHEAD conference on fairness in AI/ML, including industry representatives from Amazon and clinical research areas.

entry.title: A Talk at Course
entry.summary:
Our team member Dr. Kai Zhang gave a guest lecture on course: Foundation II (MED5311).
The topic is: AI Fairness and Data Bias Mitigation.

entry.title: A Talk at SBMI
entry.summary:
Our team member Sirui Ding gave a talk at SBMI on 2024/1/10.
The topic is: Towards Precise and Equitable Organ Transplant with Machine learning.
